Attackdex

Type: Poison

Voyager New Moves
Voyager Updated Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Acid 30 40 100 Opposing Pokémon are hit by a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
Acid Armor 20 — — The user alters its cells to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.
Acid Rain 10 — — A five-turn acid rain is summoned, empowering Poison-type moves.
Acid Spray 20 40 100 The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers its Sp. Def stat.
Baneful Bunker 10 — — This move protects the user from attacks and poisons any attacker that makes contact.
Barb Barrage 10 60 100 If the target is poisoned, this move’s power is doubled. It may poison the target.
Belch 10 120 90 The user lets out a damaging belch at the target but must eat a held Berry to do so.
Clear Smog 15 50 — The user throws a clump of special mud at the target. All stat changes are reset.
Coil 20 — — The user coils up and concentrates, raising its physical stats and accuracy.
Corrosive Gas 40 — 100 The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.
Cross Poison 20 70 100 A slashing attack with a toxic blade that may also poison. Critical hits land more easily.
Detox 5 — 100 The user is healed completely but loses its Poison type.
Dire Claw 15 80 100 The user lashes out with a ruinous claw. It may poison, paralyze, or cause sleep.
Gastro Acid 10 — 100 The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target, eliminating the effect of its abilities.
Gunk Shot 5 120 80 The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.
Malignant Chain 5 100 100 Wraps the target in a corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
Mortal Spin 15 30 100 A spin attack clears trapping effects and Leech Seed. It poisons the foe.
Noxious Needle 20 70 100 It may badly poison the foe. This move's power is doubled on Noxious Terrain.
Noxious Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, grounded Pokémon are Tormented and Poison type-moves are stronger.
Noxious Torque 10 100 100 A nauseating spinning attack that may poison the foe.
Poison Fang 15 50 100 The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave it badly poisoned.
Poison Gas 40 — 90 A cloud of poison gas is sprayed onto opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.
Poison Jab 20 80 100 The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison it.
Poison Powder 35 — 75 The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
Poison Sting 35 15 100 The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.
Poison Tail 25 50 100 The user hits the target with its tail and may also poison it. Critical hits land more easily.
Purify 20 — 100 The user heals the target's status condition and the user's own HP if successful.
Shell Side Arm 10 90 100 This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever is best, and may poison a target.
Sludge 20 65 100 Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
Sludge Bomb 10 90 100 Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
Sludge Wave 10 95 100 The user swamps everything around with a giant sludge wave that may also poison.
Smog 20 30 70 The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.
Surprise Venom 5 10 100 The user hits first and poisons the target. It only works the user's first turn.
Toxic 10 — 90 A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
Toxic Spikes 20 — — The user lays toxic spikes at the opposing team's feet to poison those switching in.
Toxic Thread 20 — 100 The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower its Speed stat.
Venom Drench 20 — 100 The Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of poisoned opposing Pokémon are lowered.
Venom Snap 5 90 90 The user impales the target with sharp teeth. This may also leave it badly poisoned.
Venoshock 10 65 100 The user drenches the target in a toxic liquid, causing double damage to poisoned targets.
